SEARCH
Package controller

Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
controller.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
The InventoryManager class provides methods for managing the inventory of medicines, including checking stock levels, dispensing, updating stock, and handling replenishment requests.
Since:
2024-10-31
Version:
2.5
Author:
Eldon Lim Kai Jie

  • Method Details

    • listInventory

      public static void listInventory()
      Lists all medicines in the inventory with their current stock levels.

    • checkInventoryLowStock

      public static boolean checkInventoryLowStock()
      Checks if any medicines in the inventory have low stock levels.
      Returns:
      true if there is any medicine with a low stock level, false otherwise

    • checkMedicineStockLevel

      public static boolean checkMedicineStockLevel(String medicineName)
      Checks the stock level of a specific medicine to see if it is low.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the medicine to check
      Returns:
      true if the specified medicine has low stock, false otherwise

    • dispenseMedicine

      public static void dispenseMedicine(String medicineName)
      Dispenses a specified quantity of a medicine from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the medicine to dispense

    • updateStock

      public static void updateStock(String medicineName, boolean isAddition)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medicine, either adding or removing a specified quantity.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the medicine to update
      isAddition - true to add stock, false to remove stock

    • getAllMedicineWithLowStockAlert

      public static List<Medicine> getAllMedicineWithLowStockAlert()
      Retrieves a list of all medicines with low stock alerts that require replenishment.
      Returns:
      a list of medicines that have low stock alerts and need replenishment

    • handleApproveReplenishmentRequest

      public static void handleApproveReplenishmentRequest(Medicine medicine)
      Approves a replenishment request for a specified medicine, increasing its stock.
      Parameters:
      medicine - the medicine for which the replenishment request is approved

    • addNewMedicine

      public static void addNewMedicine(String medicineName, int quantity, int lowStockAlertQuantity)
      Adds a new medicine to the inventory with an initial quantity and low stock alert level.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the new medicine
      quantity - the initial stock quantity of the medicine
      lowStockAlertQuantity - the stock level at which a low stock alert should be triggered
